summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4432 for the improvement of the alley in Block 1, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 1, being the alley between 11th Avenue North and 12th Avenue North, and extending from East Aloha Street to the north line of Lots 5 and 21 of said block; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52349, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
